CBOT.PA.summary: CBo Territoria SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme develops, promotes, manages, and sells real estate properties in France. Its residential properties include serviced plots, villas, townhouses, and apartments; and commercial real estate properties comprise offices, businesses, warehouses, parcels, divisible lots, and business districts. The company also owns approximately 3,000 hectares of land in the island of RÃ©union. CBo Territoria SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme is based in Sainte-Marie, France.

GALIM.PA.summary: Galimmo SCA operates as a real estate company in Europe. As of June 30, 2019, it manages a portfolio of 52 shopping malls. The company was formerly known as C&Co SCA and changed its name to Galimmo SCA in September 2016. Galimmo SCA was founded in 1902 and is based in Paris, France. Galimmo SCA is a subsidiary of Galimmo Real Estate.

NQ9.F.summary: Nexity SA operates as a real estate company in Europe and internationally. The company operates through Residential Real Estate Development, Commercial Real Estate Development, and Other Activities segments. It develops new homes and subdivisions; and new or refurbished office buildings, high-rises, business parks, logistics facilities, retail property, and hotels. The company also provides property management services comprising rental management, sales and lettings, and condominium managing agent services under the Nexity and Oralia brands, as well as the management, coordination, and development of real estate franchise networks under the Century 21 France trade name; manages serviced residences for students and for seniors; distributes real estate products under the iSelection and PERL brands; offers real estate brokerage, space planning advisory, and financial advisory services; and real estate services, including rental management and property management, consultancy, and rental of short-duration work spaces. In addition, it engages in the villes and projets, and pre-development urban regeneration project activities; and investment activities, as well as startup in the incubation phase. The company serves individual, commercial, institutional, and local authority clients. Nexity SA was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
